projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: As part of the F8 conference, Facebook announced the Graph API v2.9 and SDK 4.22 today. We should support it asap.
fields.summary: TiAPI: Update Facebook-SDKs to 4.22, support Graph v2.9

comments.body:
PR: https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.facebook/pull/85
[~emerriman] Please advice which SDK version should include the pre-packaged module, thx!

We had something similar in MOD-2283, but I don't remember what the solution was.
[~hansknoechel] Looks like you're missing some resource .xml files? I'll take a look later.
[~gmathews] Can you finish the Android review? The latest changes in the PR will use the Android AAR builder to extract the .aar instead of copying the resources manually.
Moving out of 6.2.0, as it's not 100 % required for the release and we still can release it on Github between 6.2.0 and 7.0.0.
Validated. Details are in the PR.
